definition: one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit
to pierce through/to pass through/to be stringed together/string of 1000 cash

sentences.english: Sinatra always made it all about him, and this is maybe his best-ever performance.
sentences.chinese: 辛納屈一貫地全力以赴，而這次是他史上最棒的演出。

sentences.english: The point of our pacification operations was always described as "winning the hearts and minds" of the people.
sentences.chinese: 我們綏靖行動的意義過去一貫被描寫爲“深得人心。”

sentences.english: Rhizomes consistently short necked, culms always forming a single clump.
sentences.chinese: 一貫的根狀莖短頸，稈總是形成一片單個的叢。

sentences.english: Joint Communiqués on its support of the one China policy.
sentences.chinese: 我們讚賞美國一貫表示支持一箇中國的政策。

sentences.english: If You Are The One keeps the typical humor of Feng Xiaogang.
sentences.chinese: 《非誠勿擾》保留了一貫的“馮式幽默”。

sentences.english: Was she always like this or was it some way of “getting at” Nicolas?
sentences.chinese: 弄清楚她是一貫如此還是因爲尼古拉斯引起的？

sentences.english: We have consistently called for settling international disputes by peaceful means and opposed the use of force.
sentences.chinese: 我們一貫主張和平解決國際爭端，反對使用武力。

sentences.english: They always cant about world peace.
sentences.chinese: 他們一貫侈談世界和平。

sentences.english: So our challenge is always to translate them into practice.
sentences.chinese: 因此，我們的挑戰一貫是，要把它們轉化爲實際行動。

sentences.english: After a few months of consistent practice you will really start to see progress.
sentences.chinese: 經過幾個月的一貫的練習，你將真正開始看到進展。

sentences.english: We always mean what we say do what we promise.
sentences.chinese: 我們一貫是說話算數的。

sentences.english: MacTavish was characteristically forthright in his reply.
sentences.chinese: 維什以其一貫的直率作了回答。

sentences.english: Listless game on the small girls in the United States, consistent with the proud, beautiful and arrogant.
sentences.chinese: 神氣的小美妞，帶着一貫的驕傲，美麗而高傲。

sentences.english: Door-to-door service is the consistent style of our shop.
sentences.chinese: 這部小說秉承了他一貫的沉抑風格。

sentences.english: Object formalism , it is our party consistent importunate.
sentences.chinese: 反對形式主義，是我們黨一貫堅持的。

sentences.english: It was Michael, and I quickly learned he was always like that.
sentences.chinese: 這就是邁克爾，我很快就得知他一貫如此。

definition: to make a supreme effort/at all costs
to persevere with/to persist in/to insist on
